title: Corned beef hash
ingredients: ['2 tbsp vegetable oil', '25g butter', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 red or green pepper, seeded and diced', '450g firm boiled potatoes, diced', '340g can corned beef, roughly chopped', '200g can sweetcorn, drained', '2 tbsp mango or fruity chutney', 'dash of Tabasco sauce', 'freshly ground black pepper', 'To serve', 'extra mango or fruity chutney']
